demonym: Somali;  Paul Dickson, ''Labels for locals: what to call people from Abilene to Zimbabwe'', (Merriam-Webster: 1997), p.175.  , Somalilander
established_event6: State of Somaliland united with Italian Somaliland
GDP_PPP: $1.9 billion World Bank. ''http://documents.worldbank.org/curated/en/644671486531571103/pdf/Somalia-SJPER-01302017-Final-Version.pdf Somalia Security and Justice Public Expenditure Review'' 2017.  Accessed 24 April 2017.
status: Unrecognised state, Recognised by the United Nations as ''de jure'' part of Somalia as an autonomous territory
